document.full_text: california will close up to 70 of its 278 parks to help narrow its budget gap, officials said on friday just a few days before governor jerry brown unveils a revised plan to close a roughly $15 billion deficit.
document.title: california to close up to 70 parks to save money
lines_and_colors: california will close up to 70 of its 278 parks to help narrow its budget gap, officials said on friday just a few days before governor jerry brown unveils a revised plan to close a roughly $15 billion deficit.
